title: Almighty Suspect & JP Cali Smoov On Near Death Experiences & Impact On LA
description:
3,125 views Aug 16, 2022 Almighty Suspect talks about growing up with a battle rapper Dad, judging battles when he was 12, why he doesn't want to battle, and Smoov talks about making hits with the biggest names, his terrible accident, and more!


-----
00:00 Intro
1:56 Dizaster and Lush remember Almighty Suspect's dad as an important figure in the battle scene
5:40 Participation trophy is trash: "Either you're good or you're not!"
13:00 Diz says he wants to make broader music for everyone to understand not just battle rap niche
13:47 Smoov says after battling Diz, he had to tone it down and makes his raps more relatable
17:39 Back in the day Almighty Suspect had a lot of people copying his style
23:35 Diz was ambushed in a grimy battle in Brooklyn
27:00 Reacting to every little thing that's said about you online, getting backlash for giving your opinion
36:47 Smoov making anti-gang records after going to jail, doesn't wanna be around it, it's ok to be square
42:17 "I'm from woopty woopty woop, f*ck woopty woop" lolll
46:31 Smoov gets super emotional talking about surviving an accident and losing his best friend
54:03 Smoov battled in Brasil, got his grills stolen at the restaurant, they don't speak English
1:03:12 Rappers don't know how to diss anymore, plus says he can't battle rap because of his dad, it would be embarrassing if he loses
1:05:36 Almighty Suspect says you gotta d*e to get clout + How 6ix9ine dominated IG and now not even suggested in the algorithm anymore
-----
